explains: adj. 撩人的；逗引性的；干着急的
v. 惹弄；逗弄人（tantalize 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: A tantalizing aroma of roast beef fills the air.
sentences.cn: 烤牛肉诱人的香味弥漫在空气中。

sentences.en: The tantalizing aroma of fresh coffee wafted towards them.
sentences.cn: 新鲜咖啡那诱人的香味向他们飘来。

sentences.en: By a tantalizing quirk of fate, the pair have been drawn to meet in the first round of the championship.
sentences.cn: 由于命运的捉弄，这对选手被抽中在锦标赛的第一轮相遇。
